library.description: Fast implementation of JSON-Patch (RFC-6902) with duplex (observe changes) capabilities
library.name: Fast-JSON-Patch

library.description:
Generate and parse json rpc messages

Client and server.
On websocket and http.
Full support json-rpc specification 2.0
library.name: simple-jsonrpc-js

library.description:
jqTree is a tree widget.


Create a tree from JSON data
Drag and drop
Works on ie7+, firefox 3.6+, chrome and safari
Written in Coffeescript
library.name: jqTree

library.description:
LocalDB.js is a tool that maps the structure of the databases in objects using the localStorage API, no database drivers are required, just add the library and use it!

Useful for web applications, mobile apps or game engines.
library.name: LocalDB.js (NoSQL)

library.description: A web-based tool to view, edit and format JSON.
library.name: jsoneditor

library.description: Allow data structures with circular references to be serialized in to two JSON strings, and be parsed back in to an object complete with circular references
library.name: JSONycle

library.description:
Cross-browser DataTable is a powerful JavaScript grid control built with an innovative approach and the latest web development trends in mind. 
Itâ€™s currently one of the fastest JavaScript grid solutions ever created.Speed tests showed that DataTable loads 1,000 rows and columns 10 times faster than other grid libraries currently on the market.
A powerful and feature-rich grid can now fit in a .js file of 38 Kb (gzipped).
DataTable supports the display of tree-like structures, similar to what Tree offers.
DataTable can load data from XML, JSON and CSV files and also allows you to use your own formats of data. 
DataTable provides built-in integration with jQuery framework. 
The appearance of DataTable is defined fully with CSS, making the grid highly customizable.
DataTable can be used in mobile web apps that run on touch devices. The user interface is optimized for touch screens.
Column and row height and width can be changed by dragging the vertical and horizontal borders of the table.
You can create a grid with two frozen areas on the left and right sides with scrollable columns in between.
library.name: Webix DataTable

library.description:
HTML5/JavaScript Charts widget that presents data in spectacular graphic figures. It includes such popular chart types as line, spline, area, bar, pie, 3s pie, donut, scatter, and radar.

You can define the chart appearance by changing the design of all its elements, including the tooltip, color, scale, template and more.
Webix Charts can load data from XML, JSON, JSArray and CSV formats with ease. Due to the high customizability of XML and JSON data formats, you can use the Chart with your existing web services too.
With Webix Charts you can develop a chart that has a line and bar series at the same time. 

The data on Charts can be easily sorted according to particular parameters by clicking on special inbuilt buttons.
You can filter data in Webix Charts clicking on the buttons with filtering features.

Multiple data sets can be presented on one Webix charts run across various browsers such as IE10, Mozilla Firefox, Opera, Chrome and Safari.

Webix Charts support natural data mapping and accurately operates on all touch devices.
library.name: Webix Charts
